mapper.select: select a.itemId, b.memberName, c.reviewNo, c.reviewContent, c.reviewStar, d.profileImg, d.nickname from sapareItem a left outer join sapareOrder b on a.itemId = b.itemId left outer join sapareReview c on b.orderId = c.orderId left outer join sapareMember d on b.memberName = d.memberName where a.memberName=#{memberName, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and reviewNo is not null order by a.itemId desc
